M

mergeResolution(Clause) - Methode in Klasse Datastructures.ClauseList
This method is used to perform a merge resolution between a shorter parent OR-clause and corresponding other clauses
The method uses timestamps to quickly identify candidate clauses for the merge-resolution.
If shorterParent is shortened itself, the method is called recursively.
If another clause is shortened a ShortenedClauseTask is inserted into the queue.
model - Variable in Klasse Datastructures.ClauseList
The global model
monitor - Variable in Klasse Datastructures.ClauseList
monitors the inference steps
myThread - Variable in Klasse Datastructures.ClauseList
to prevent the model.add()-method of calling the ClauseList-observer
